name: ToriDori
description:
ToriDori is designed for a leisurely search for differences accompanied by specially selected music, which will help you relax and free yourself from negative thoughts. The hint system also contributes to this. It will direct your attention in the right direction without leading you by the hand, only helping you focus on the necessary part of the space.
To expand the gaming experience, there are 40 adorable achievements in the game. Collect them all!



The 3D graphics take the search to a new level and open up additional search planes. Use all the game space! But time doesn't stand still either. After completing one timeline, you will have access to another, allowing you to delve deeper into the game's stories.
Don't forget to return to the captain's cabin. As you progress through the game, it will fill up with trophies from different worlds.

Game Features:
Finding differences
Dioramas with different stories and their continuations
40 dioramas (94 segments)
Dioramas consisting of different numbers of segments.
After completing a task, you can examine the presented landscape in more detail.
There is a hint system
Interactive captain's cabin.
Relaxing music will calm and immerse you in the game.
Expanded graphics settings will help find a balance between quality and performance.
Flexible display settings for differences
A cat.
